title: EP 138 "Revelationz" w/ Guerilla Black
itunes:title: EP 138 "Revelationz" w/ Guerilla Black
description:
Are we now living in the times prophesized in not only the bible, but many other religions? On the premiere episode of "Revelationz" we talk about why we may be close based on the present state of the world, rumors of war, poverty, plagues, the imminent financial collapse upon us. We explain the "mark of the beast" and why the "Anti-Christ", who scripture say's will die and come back to life may be ushered in with artificial intelligence- Wake up and stay woke!

 

 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
